author: Paul Rankin
method: To make the guacamole, place all of the guacamole ingredients into a food processor and blend until smooth. To make the salad, whisk together the oil and vinegar in a bowl. Add the tomato and avocado, season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix together well. To serve, place the salad onto a plate and spoon the guacamole around.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove ,  ½ avocado, peeled, stone removed,  1 tsp chopped fresh coriander,  ½ lemon juice only,  2 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tsp balsamic vinegar ,  1 tomato, deseeded, finely chopped,  ½ avocado, peeled, stone removed, finely chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
